item.title: 垃圾时间中国经济衰退催生经济绝望新模式
item.description: 中国经济的萎靡不振在网上引发了一种新的悲观情绪，即对就业、收入和机会出现任何转机的前景感到悲观："历史的垃圾时期"。【原文：China’s sputtering economy has prompted a dire, new shorthand online for pessimism about the prospects for any turnaround for jobs, incomes and opportunity: “the garbage time of history.”】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Domino's 因在日本和法国关闭门店而增长平平
item.description: 澳大利亚多米诺比萨企业周三表示，预计本财年门店增长将持平或略有增长，并决定在日本关闭多达80家低销量门店，在法国关闭10-20家门店。【原文：Australia's Domino's Pizza Enterprises said on Wednesday it expects store growth to be flat to slightly positive in its current fiscal year, and decided to close up to 80 low-volume stores in Japan and 10-20 stores in France.】

item.title: 本田将 31.6 亿美元交易中的次级股票售价定为折让 3
item.description: 本田汽车表示，该公司已将二次股票销售的股票定价为每股 1664.5 日元，比周三的收盘价折价 3%，交易价值为 4970 亿日元（约合 31.6 亿美元）。【原文：Honda Motor has priced shares in a secondary share sale at 1,664.5 yen each, or a 3% discount to Wednesday's closing price, valuing the deal at 497 billion yen ($3.16 billion), the automaker said.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯二度上调业绩展望，第二季度表现强劲，股价大涨 5
item.description: 周三，阿迪达斯股价大涨 5%，创下两年多来的新高，因为这家德国运动服装公司今年第二次上调了全年业绩指引，周二公布的第二季度业绩超出预期。【原文：Adidas shares jumped as much as 5% on Wednesday, hitting their highest in over two years, after the German sportswear company hiked its full-year guidance for the second time this year, having beaten expectations with its second-quarter results on Tuesday.】

item.title: Cinco Dias 称，西班牙基金 Criteria 将与斯柯达联手竞购 Talgo
item.description: 据《Cinco Dias 报》周三援引接近斯柯达收购要约的不愿透露姓名的消息来源报道，La Caixa 基金会旗下的投资机构 Criteria 正在考虑与捷克火车制造商斯柯达联手收购 Talgo。【原文：Spain's Criteria, the investment arm of the La Caixa foundation, is considering teaming up with Czech train maker Skoda in its bid for Talgo , Cinco Dias newspaper reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources close to the Skoda offer.】

item.title: 依视路将收购永高和海德堡工程公司
item.description: 法国-意大利眼镜制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）与美国服装鞋类集团 VF Corporation 周三表示，双方已同意以 15 亿美元现金收购街头服饰品牌 Supreme。【原文：French-Italian eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica has agreed to buy streetwear brand Supreme from U.S. apparel and footwear group VF Corporation for $1.5 billion in cash, both companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 意大利反垄断调查阿玛尼和迪奥涉嫌剥削工人案
item.description: 意大利竞争管理机构（AGCM）周三表示，已开始对奢侈时装集团阿玛尼和迪奥涉嫌在供应链中剥削工人一事展开调查。【原文：Italy's competition authority (AGCM) said on Wednesday it had started an investigation into luxury fashion groups Armani and Dior over the alleged exploitation of workers in their supply chain.】

item.title: 美联储降息预期升温，亚洲债券连续第二个月迎来外资流入
item.description: 受美国联邦储备委员会在通胀水平放缓和劳动力市场降温的情况下降息预期的提振，6 月份外国人连续第二个月成为亚洲债券的净投资者。【原文：Foreigners were net investors in Asian bonds for a second straight month in June, buoyed by expectations of an interest rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve amid easing inflation levels and cooling labour market conditions.】

item.title: 龙卷风袭击仓库，利洁时婴儿配方奶粉销售受挫
item.description: 利洁时公司周三表示，其美赞臣婴儿配方粉的短期销售可能会受到影响，因为龙卷风袭击了印第安纳州的一个第三方仓库，造成重大损失。【原文：Reckitt said on Wednesday short-term sales of its Mead Johnson baby formula powder are likely to be affected after a tornado struck a third-party warehouse in Indiana that sustained significant damages.】

item.title: 英国通胀率维持在 2%，但基本价格压力依然强劲
item.description: 英国上个月的通胀率维持在 2.0%，与预期的小幅下降背道而驰，潜在的价格压力持续存在，这使得英国央行自 2020 年以来首次降息的日期仍存在不确定性。【原文：British inflation held at 2.0% last month, defying forecasts for a slight fall, and underlying price pressures persisted, maintaining uncertainty about the date of the Bank of England's first interest rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，谷歌支持的软件开发商 GitLab 正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，GitLab 是美国一家基于云的软件开发工具提供商，其投资者包括谷歌母公司 Alphabet，在吸引了收购意向后，该公司正在探索出售事宜。【原文：GitLab , a U.S. provider of cloud-based software development tools whose investors include Google parent Alphabet , is exploring a sale after attracting acquisition interest, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新闻发言人 汇丰银行的埃尔德里从财务人员快速晋升为首席执行官
item.description: 2022 年，当乔治-艾德礼（Georges Elhedery）离开汇丰银行六个月时，有些人担心他在这家以亚洲为重点的银行工作了 17 年的时间就此结束。但两年过去了，这位讲普通话的新手距离成为首席执行官仅有几周时间。【原文：When Georges Elhedery took a six-month break from HSBC in 2022, some feared he had called time on a 17-year stint at the Asia-focused lender. But two years on, the novice Mandarin-speaker is just weeks away from becoming chief executive.】

item.title: 香港房地产经纪人称中国大陆购房人数创历史新高
item.description: 大型房地产经纪公司中原地产表示，在金融中心取消所有购房禁令后的前六个月，中国大陆买家在香港的购房量创下新高，他们的交易额占总交易额的 31%。【原文：Hong Kong saw record home purchases by mainland Chinese buyers in the first six months after the financial hub removed all buying curbs, major realtor Centaline Property Agency said, with their transaction value accounting for 31% of the total.】

item.title: 保乐力加将向 Accolade Wine 所有者出售大部分葡萄酒产品组合
item.description: 保乐力加公司周三表示，同意将其大部分葡萄酒产品出售给澳大利亚 Accolade Wines 公司的所有者，从而放弃了一个拖后腿的部门，专注于其核心业务--烈酒。【原文：Pernod Ricard said on Wednesday it agreed to sell the majority of its wine portfolio to the owners of Australia's Accolade Wines, disposing of a dragging division to focus on its core business of spirits.】

item.title: 特朗普连任预期升温，投资者搭上 "特朗普交易 "顺风车
item.description: 人们对美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普将在 11 月重夺白宫的预期不断升温，这使得所谓的 "特朗普交易 "愈演愈烈，因为人们认为他的政策将提高企业利润，同时也引发了对美国长期财政健康的担忧。【原文：Rising expectations that former President Donald Trump will regain the White House in November are supercharging the so-called Trump trade, on views that his policies will lift corporate profits even while spurring worries about the country’s long-term fiscal health.】

item.title: 中国经济增长放缓，奢侈品牌倍感压力
item.description: 分析师和高管警告说，中国奢侈品消费的长期低迷今年不太可能扭转，这将加深近几个月来该行业价值缩水近 2,000 亿美元的颓势。【原文：The prolonged downturn in luxury spending in China is unlikely to reverse this year, analysts and executives warn, deepening a rout which has wiped almost $200 billion off the sector's value in recent months.】

item.title: 汇丰银行新任首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）面临的五大挑战
item.description: 汇丰银行新任首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）将面临的首要挑战包括：在利率下降的情况下实现经济增长、应对中国与西方之间的紧张关系，以及管理汇丰在中国挥之不去的不良贷款危机中的风险。【原文：Delivering growth amid falling interest rates, navigating tensions between China and the West, and managing HSBC's exposure to China's lingering bad loans crisis will be among the top challenges facing the bank's new CEO Georges Elhedery.】

item.title: 日本铃木公司的目标是在十年内将主要车型的重量减轻 15
item.description: 日本铃木汽车公司（Suzuki Motor）周三表示，该公司计划在未来十年内将小型奥拓掀背车的重量减轻 15%，目的是降低汽车的能耗，并将这些技术成果应用于其他车型。【原文：Japan's Suzuki Motor said on Wednesday it plans to cut the weight of its small Alto hatchback by 15% over the next decade, aiming to reduce the vehicle's energy usage and employ those technology gains in other models.】

item.title: 早间竞价黄金闪耀，通胀不安
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国考虑制定更严厉的贸易规则打击中国芯片市场
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，拜登政府已通知盟友，如果东京电子和 ASML Holding NV 等公司继续向中国提供先进的半导体技术，拜登政府将考虑对中国采取最严厉的贸易限制措施。【原文：The Biden administration has informed allies that it is considering using the most severe trade restrictions available for China if companies including Tokyo Electron and ASML Holding NV continue giving the country access to advanced semiconductor technology, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行任命 Georges Elhedery 为集团首席执行官
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Ltd）周三表示，已任命乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）为集团首席执行官，任命自 9 月 2 日起生效。【原文：HSBC Holdings Ltd said on Wednesday it has appointed Georges Elhedery as its group chief executive, with effect from Sept. 2.】

item.title: 统计局称中国 6 月 16-24 岁人口失业率为 13.2
item.description: 中国统计局周三表示，除大学生外，中国16至24岁人口的失业率在6月份为13.2%。【原文：The jobless rate for 16 to 24 year olds in China, excluding college students, was at 13.2% for the month of June, the country's statistics bureau said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 考虑到中国的长期需求，中国的黄金购买高峰稍纵即逝
item.description: 据一位政策业内人士、行业专家和数据显示，尽管中国在 5 月和 6 月暂停了官方黄金购买，但其金银持有量占储备的比例仍然很低，地缘政治紧张局势持续存在，因此中国仍有很大的购买欲望。【原文：China still has plenty of appetite for official gold purchases despite pausing in May and June, as its bullion holdings remain low as a share of reserves and geopolitical tensions persist, according to a policy insider, industry experts and data.】

item.title: 降息呼之欲出，黄金再创新高，特朗普言论打击台湾股市
item.description: 周三，随着市场为全球利率下降做好准备，黄金创下历史新高，债券也出现反弹，而台湾股市则在美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普对台湾国防承诺态度冷淡后出现下滑。【原文：Gold hit a record and bonds rallied on Wednesday as markets prepared for global interest rates to fall, while stocks in Taiwan slipped after U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump sounded lukewarm in his commitment to the island's defence.】

item.title: 特朗普称台湾应支付防务费用后，台积电股价下跌逾 2
item.description: 在美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）称台湾应支付国防费用后，合约芯片制造商台积电的股价周三下跌超过 2%。【原文：Shares of contract chip manufacturer TSMC fell more than 2% on Wednesday after U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said Taiwan should pay for defence.】

item.title: 美联储再次降息，美元摇摆不定
item.description: 周三，美元汇率涨跌不一，此前，美国零售销售数据好于预期，美元汇率受到了短暂的小幅提振，交易员们关注美联储最早将于 9 月份降息的前景。【原文：The dollar was mixed on Wednesday after a modest but short-lived boost following better-than-expected U.S. retail sales data, as traders focused on the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts as early as September.】

item.title: 美国将于 8 月发布限制中国汽车软件的拟议规则
item.description: 一位高级官员周二表示，美国商务部计划在下个月发布有关联网汽车的拟议规则，并预计将对中国和其他被视为对手的国家制造的一些软件施加限制。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department plans to issue proposed rules on connected vehicles next month and expects to impose limits on some software made in China and other countries deemed adversaries, a senior official said Tuesday.】

item.title: 需求放缓抵消供应紧缩，油价保持稳定
item.description: 由于中国需求增长减弱的迹象与美国石油库存下降的前景发生冲突，周三亚洲早盘油价持稳，全球基准布伦特油价在上一交易日创下的一个月低点附近徘徊。【原文：Oil prices were steady in early Asian trade on Wednesday, with global benchmark Brent hovering near the one-month low it hit in the prior session, as signs of weakening demand growth in China clashed with the prospect of declining U.S. oil stockpiles.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "我支持 TikTok"，美国可能禁用 TikTok
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他支持 TikTok，尽管如果中国母公司字节跳动未能剥离该短视频应用在美国的资产，TikTok 可能会被禁止。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he supports TikTok even as a potential ban looms if Chinese-parent company ByteDance fails to divest the short video app's U.S. assets.】

item.title: 惠誉恢复达美航空投资级评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周二将达美航空的信用评级上调至投资级，理由是其资产负债表在过去三年中有所改善。【原文：Fitch Ratings on Tuesday upgraded Delta Air Lines' credit rating to investment grade, citing improvements in its balance sheet in the past three years.】
